column4: can anyone tell me what the command "apt-get install build-essential linux-headers-$(uname -r)"
installs?
please help
it installs linux headers for your current kernel...
what are linux headers?
and build essential
what do they do? and what should i do if i ever want them off? will ever need them off?
source code that lets you compile things that require them.  The better question is why do you want to install these things if you do not know what they are?
